name: Street Pursuit
description: Get into your super cool car vehicle, then collect cash on the streets as much as you can, and beat the cops in skill racer in this fun game.  Make sure you meet the target level for upgrades then unlock new areas and keep an eye on the time.  You have to Use power-ups to beat your pursuers and score more and more points.  Go full gangsta and start the engine now, let's get started
